title: Poll shows Republicans divide evenly over support for Trump
description: Carrie Dann looks back over polling since 2019 to see how Republican voters view President Trump, and where those splits differ from elected Republicans.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Carrie Dann looks back over polling since 2019 to see how Republican voters view President Trump, and where those splits differ from elected Republicans.
